segments.text: Hi , can you tell me where I could make a copy of a document right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , you can come downstairs right now to the computer lab .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . I don't suppose the copy machine is free for guests ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , each copy is ten cents or one dime , whichever you prefer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the good old days , it was only five cents a copy . I'll be right down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Those were the good old days , sir , indeed .
segments.speaker: S2
